verbose_text: In the experiment, the microwave signal V 0 is used to modulate the amplitude of the light from a 1547 nm, single-mode laser source consisting of an electro-absorption modulated diode laser (EADL), an erbium doped fibre amplifier (EDFA) and a polarisation scrambler.
evidence: microwave signal V 0  is used to modulate the amplitude of the light
